name: Mise en œuvre de l’article 43 de la directive relative aux procédures d'asile - Implementation of Article 43 of the Asylum Procedures Directive - Umsetzung von Artikel 43 der Asylverfahrensrichtlinie -  - Erik Marquardt - § 4/1
green_remark: Request to apply border procedure only in strict and legally defined circumstances
title: Implementation report on Article 43 of Directive 2013/32/EU on common procedures for granting and withdrawing international protection
